references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Glide, a text-guided diffusion model for photorealistic image generation and editing, which is foundational to many subsequent text-to-image models and directly relevant to the attribution methods in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis, which forms the basis of many modern text-to-image models, making it a critical foundation for the research described here.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a hierarchical text-conditional image generation model using CLIP, a significant advancement in text-to-image synthesis and directly relevant to this work's focus on attribution of text-to-image models.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art text-to-image diffusion model demonstrating high photorealism and deep language understanding, improving upon the models used in the cited work and providing further context for their data attribution method.

references.paper_title: Understanding black-box predictions via influence functions
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of influence functions, a technique for understanding model predictions by approximating the impact of individual training datapoints, which forms the theoretical foundation for many data attribution techniques in the current paper.
